translation: 「南無普光明佛 南無功德多寶海王佛 南無不空功德佛 南無照一切處佛 南無妙鼓聲佛 南無法自在佛 南無法自在佛 南無普見佛

source_sentence: 「南無三十六億十一萬九千五百同名淨王佛。
translation: To the south, there are 3.6 billion 11,900,000 buddhas of the same name named Pure King Buddha.

source_sentence: 此諸佛名百千萬劫不可得聞，如優曇鉢華。
translation: These buddhas' names can't be heard for a hundred million eons, like the udumbara flower.

source_sentence: 若復有人受持讀誦此諸佛名，畢竟遠離諸煩惱。
translation: If another person memorizes and recites the names of these buddhas, they'll be ultimately free of afflictions.

source_sentence: 「舍利弗！
translation: “O Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 汝等應當敬禮波頭摩勝如來。
translation: You should venerate the Tathāgata Padmaśrī.

source_sentence: 「南無寂王佛　南無燈作佛　南無天光佛　南無德山佛　南無勝上佛　南無娑羅王佛　南無淨王佛　南無大慧梁佛　南無須彌佛　南無大智慧須彌佛　南無寶作佛　南無寶藏佛　南無破金剛佛　南無賢智不動佛　南無普香佛　南無甘露命佛　南無難勝佛　南無月光佛　南無日照佛　南無智雞兜佛　南無大師子佛　南無彌留山佛　南無香光佛　南無德山佛　南無大通佛　南無阿摩羅藏佛　南無寶圍佛　南無金剛藏佛　南無優波羅藏佛　南無大日佛　南無橋樑載佛　南無月勝佛　南無樂堅固佛　南無不可思議法身佛　南無勝藏佛　南無不空王佛　南無金剛無礙智佛　南無寶炎佛　南無賒施燈佛　南無降伏一切怨佛　南無自在佛　南無大智真聲佛　南無般若香象佛　南無天王佛「舍利弗！
translation: 「南無寂王佛 南無燈作佛 南無天光佛 南無德山佛 南無勝上佛 南無娑羅王佛 南無淨王佛 南無大慧梁佛 南無須彌佛

source_sentence: 若有善男子、善女人，聞此諸佛名受持讀誦不生疑者，是人八千億劫不入地獄，
translation: If there are any sons and daughters of a virtuous family who hear the names of these buddhas, memorize and recite them without doubt—that person will not go to hell for eighty-eight billion kalpas.

source_sentence: 不入畜生，不入餓鬼道，不生邊地，不生貧窮家，不生下賤家，常生天人豪貴之處，
translation: They won’t enter the realm of animals or the realm of hungry ghosts, won’t be born in a marginal land, won’t be born in a poor home, won’t be born in a lowly home, and will always be born

source_sentence: 常得歡喜適樂無礙，常得一切世間尊重供養，乃至得大涅槃。
translation: They always attain unobstructed joy and happiness, always receive the respect and offerings of all worldly beings, until they attain great nirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 舍利弗！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 汝等應當敬禮不可嫌身佛。
translation: You should venerate the Buddha of the body that's not to be disliked.

source_sentence: 「南無稱聲佛　南無稱威德佛　南無稱名佛　南無葉陀佛　南無聲炎佛　南無金剛定自在佛　南無聲分勇猛佛　南無智勝佛　南無智善知佛　南無智聚佛　南無智勇猛佛　南無梵勝佛　南無淨婆藪佛　南無淨心佛　南無淨天佛　南無淨聲佛　南無梵自在佛　南無威德佛　南無毘摩勝佛　南無毘摩意佛　南無毘摩面佛　南無毘摩上佛　南無常念一切眾生苦佛　南無無邊聲佛　南無實見佛　南無善眼月佛　南無深聲佛　南無放聲佛　南無驚怖魔力聲佛　南無淨眼佛　南無無邊眼佛　南無普眼佛　南無勝眼佛　南無不可行佛　南無寂勝佛　南無善寂心佛　南無善寂根佛　南無善寂意佛　南無善寂德佛　南無善住佛　南無眾自在王佛　南無大眾自在佛　南無眾解脫佛　南無法幢佛　南無法山佛　南無法勝佛　南無法體佛　南無法力佛　南無法勇猛佛　南無法體決定佛　南無第二劫中八十億同名法體決定佛「舍利弗！
translation: 「南無稱聲佛 南無稱威德佛 南無稱威德佛 南無稱名佛 南無葉陀佛 南無聲炎佛 南無聲炎佛 南無金剛定自在佛 南無聲

source_sentence: 若有善男子、善女人，受持讀誦是諸佛名，畢竟不入地獄，速得三昧。
translation: If there are good men and good women who memorize and recite these names of the buddhas, they won't enter hell after all and quickly attain samādhi.

source_sentence: 「舍利弗！
translation: “O Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 過是佛名無量無邊阿僧祇劫，有佛名人自在聲，汝等應當一心歸命。
translation: After this Buddha's name is immeasurable, limitless, and incalculably long eon, there are buddhas whose names have unimpeded voices, so you should singlemindedly return to their lives.

source_sentence: 彼人自在聲佛，壽命七十千萬劫住世，初會三億聲聞眾集、八十那由他千萬菩薩眾集，
translation: The first assembly assembled three hundred million śrāvakas and eighty myriads of koṭis of bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 皆得諸神通具四無礙，通達一切空到彼岸。
translation: They all attain the four unobstructed supernormal powers, comprehend all emptiness and reach the other shore.

source_sentence: 我若無量劫住世，說彼佛大會國土莊嚴，如大海水中一滴之分。
translation: If I were to live in the world for measureless eons, I would explain the adornments of that Buddha's great assembly of lands and lands like a drop in the water of the ocean.

source_sentence: 「南無三昧定自在佛　南無慧定自在佛　南無相覺自在佛　南無普攝佛　南無寶德普光佛　南無迦羅鳩村大佛　南無意樂美音佛　南無歡喜佛　南無師子音佛　南無師子相佛　南無雲自在佛　南無常滅佛　南無帝相佛　南無梵相佛　南無阿彌陀佛　南無度一切世間苦惱佛　南無雲自在王佛　南無壞一切世間怖畏佛　南無百億我釋迦牟尼佛　南無彌勒佛　南無淨身佛　南無華光佛　南無華足佛　南無光明佛　南無名相佛　南無閻浮那提金光佛　南無法明佛　南無寶明佛　南無普明佛　南無普相佛　南無光相佛　南無普光佛　南無山海慧佛　南無自在通王佛　南無寶莊嚴佛　南無弗沙佛　南無百億自在燈王佛　南無喜見佛　南無二萬光相莊嚴王佛　南無三萬同號善德佛　南無雷寶音王佛　南無四萬八千定光佛　南無寶月王佛　南無離垢光佛　南無妙色光明佛　南無破一切眾難佛　南無眾香佛　南無眾嚴佛　南無十千莊嚴光明佛　南無八十億莊嚴光明佛　南無寶華莊嚴佛　南無上首德王佛　南無紫金光明佛　南無五百授記華光佛　南無那羅延不壞佛　南無好華莊嚴佛「次禮十二部經大藏法輪。
translation: 「南無三昧定自在佛 南無智慧定自在佛 南無相覺自在佛 南無普攝佛 南無寶德普光佛 南無迦羅鳩村大佛 南無意樂美音佛

source_sentence: 「敬禮十方諸大菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: He venerates the great bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas of the ten directions.

source_sentence: 「歸命如是等十方世界無量無邊諸大菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: Taking refuge in such and other great bodhisattva-mahāsattvas of measureless and limitless worlds in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 「敬禮聲聞緣覺一切賢聖。
translation: He venerates all the śrāvakas, pratyekbuddhas, and all the good men and sages.

source_sentence: 「歸命如是等無量無邊辟支佛。
translation: I take refuge in such measureless and limitless pratyekabuddhas as these.

source_sentence: 「舍利弗！
translation: “O Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若有善男子、善女人、比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，能受持讀誦此諸佛菩薩名者，
translation: If there are good men, good women, monks, nuns, laymen, and laymen who can memorize and recite the names of these buddhas and bodhisattvas,

source_sentence: 終不墮惡道生天人中，常值諸佛、菩薩、善知識，遠離諸煩惱乃至得大菩提。」
translation: They never fall into a bad destiny and are born among gods and humans, always meet buddhas, bodhisattvas, and good teachers, part with the afflictions, and attain great enlightenment.

source_sentence: 佛說此佛名經已，慧命舍利弗及摩訶男比丘，及諸比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，
translation: After the Buddha had taught this sutra on the names of these buddhas, Huishou Śāriputra and Mahānāma bhikṣus, as well as all the other monks, bhikṣuṇīs, laymen, and laywomen,

source_sentence: 天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人，
translation: Gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, and nonhumans.

source_sentence: 及諸菩薩摩訶薩，皆大歡喜頂受奉行。
translation: And the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, all rejoiced and accepted it with great joy.

source_sentence: 「禮三寶已，次復懺悔。
translation: “After paying homage to the Three Treasures, he next repents.

source_sentence: 「弟子等！
translation: Disciples!

source_sentence: 已懺三途等報，今當復次稽懇懺悔人天餘報。
translation: I've already confessed the three paths and so forth, and now I'll next repent of the other rewards of humans and gods with sincerity.

source_sentence: 相與稟此閻浮壽命，雖曰百年滿者無幾，於其中間盛年夭枉其數無量，
translation: Although it is said to be a hundred years old, the duration of life in Jambudvīpa is not long. The number of deaths among them is immeasurable during their prime time.

source_sentence: 但有眾苦煎迫形心，愁憂恐怯未曾暫離，如此皆是善根微弱惡業滋多，
translation: But there are various forms of being tormented and oppressed by suffering, grieved and fearful, never leaving them for a moment. All this is due to the weakness of roots of virtue and the abundance of bad actions.

source_sentence: 致使現在心有所為皆不稱意，當知悉是過去已來惡業餘報。
translation: It should be known that they are all the residual retributions of bad action since the past.

source_sentence: 是故，弟子！
translation: Therefore, disciple!

source_sentence: 今日至誠歸依佛。
translation: To this day, I sincerely rely on the Buddha.

source_sentence: 「南無東方大莊嚴佛　南無南方智慧火佛　南無西方智香勝佛　南無北方智力王佛　南無東南方那羅延勝業佛　南無西南方雨娛樂佛　南無西北方諦法普稱佛　南無東北方三乘行佛　南無下方大通智勝佛　南無上方電燈豐王佛「歸命如是等十方盡虛空界一切三寶。
translation: 「南無東方大莊嚴佛 南無南方智慧火佛 南無西方智香勝佛 南無北方智力王佛 南無東南方那羅延勝業佛 南無西南方雨娛樂佛 南無西北方諦法

source_sentence: 「弟子等！
translation: Disciples!

source_sentence: 自從無始已來至于今日，所有現在及以未來人天之中，無量餘報流殃宿對，
translation: From beginningless time up to the present, there are countless other karmic retributions and misfortunes in humans and gods of the present and future.

source_sentence: 癃殘百疾六根不具罪報懺悔；
translation: They suffer from all kinds of wounds, a hundred illnesses, and the six organs are not provided with the retribution for their sins.

source_sentence: 人間邊地邪見三惡八難罪報懺悔；
translation: Retribution for the three evil and eight heinous sins of wrong views in the human realm is through repentance.

source_sentence: 人間多病痟瘦促命夭枉罪報懺悔；
translation: Among the common people there were many who suffered from hunger and thinness, died young, and lost their lives.

source_sentence: 人間六親眷屬不能常得相保相守罪報懺悔；
translation: The six kinds of relatives and dependents in the human world are unable to always keep their marks, preserve their marks, guard their offenses, and repent.

source_sentence: 人間親友凋喪愛別離苦罪報懺悔；
translation: People’s friends and relatives withered away, their loved ones were separated from each other, and they repented of the painful consequences of their crimes.

source_sentence: 人間怨家聚會愁憂怖畏罪報懺悔；
translation: People’s enemies and clanspeople gathered together to grieve and fearfully repent of their sins.

source_sentence: 人間水火盜賊刀兵危嶮驚懼恐怯罪報懺悔；
translation: The people are terrified by the danger of water, fire, thieves, bandits, swords, and soldiers.

source_sentence: 人間孤獨困苦流離波迸亡失國土罪報懺悔；
translation: Retribution and repentance for the sins of those who have been orphaned, starved, tormented, and scattered away from their lands.

source_sentence: 人間牢獄繫閉幽執側立鞭撻拷楚罪報懺悔；
translation: He was imprisoned in the hell of humans, locked up in seclusion, sidelined, flogged, tortured, and executed.

source_sentence: 人間公私口舌更相羅染更相誹謗罪報懺悔；
translation: The public and private officials of the people, verbally and tongueless, became even more defiled by each other. They reviled against each other and slandered each other.

source_sentence: 人間惡病連年累月不差枕臥床席不能起居罪報懺悔；
translation: For years and months on end, the sicknesses of the people continued unafflicted. They did not leave their pillows, beds, seats, or any other place to lie down; they were unable to get up and stay [to sleep].

source_sentence: 人間冬溫夏疫毒厲傷寒罪報懺悔；
translation: In winter and in summer the people suffer greatly from epidemics, poisons, pestilence, diseases, and cold.

source_sentence: 人間賊風腫滿否塞罪報懺悔；
translation: The thief among the people, whose wind and swelling filled them with abscesses, repented of his sins.

source_sentence: 人間為諸惡神伺求其便欲作禍祟罪報懺悔；
translation: In the human world, evil spirits seek them and then want to commit misdeeds and repent of sins.

source_sentence: 人間有鳥鳴百怪飛屍邪鬼為作妖異罪報懺悔；
translation: In the human world there are birds that sing a hundred strange sounds, flying corpses, and evil spirits who commit heinous crimes to repent.

source_sentence: 人間為虎豹豺狼水陸一切諸惡禽獸所傷罪報懺悔；
translation: Human beings repent of their sins inflicted by tigers, leopards, jackals, wolves, water spirits, and other evil animals.

source_sentence: 人間自結自刺自殺自害罪報懺悔；
translation: Among the people of Jambudvfpa, there are those who commit suicide by themselves and confess their sins as punishment.

source_sentence: 人間自憂自惋自勒自瞋自喜罪報懺悔；
translation: The people felt grieved and distressed, angry and overjoyed at their sins.

source_sentence: 人間投坑赴火自沈自墜罪報懺悔；
translation: The people cast themselves into a pit, went to the fire, drown themselves and fell down; they repented of their sins.

source_sentence: 人間無有威德名聞罪報懺悔；
translation: In the human world there is no one of authority, virtue, fame, or reputation who hears the retribution of sins and repents.

source_sentence: 人間衣服資生不得稱心罪報懺悔；
translation: The common people, dressed and provided with necessities, are not allowed to confess their sins.

source_sentence: 人間行來出入有所云為值惡知識為作留難罪報懺悔。
translation: Whatever comes out and goes in the human condition, they say it's to meet bad friends or make a repentance for their crimes that are difficult to punish.

source_sentence: 如是現在未來人天之中，無量禍橫災疫厄難衰惱罪報懺悔。
translation: Thus, in the present and future among humans and gods, there will be measureless calamities, disasters, epidemics, and difficulties that will cause repentance for their sins.

source_sentence: 弟子！
translation: disciple!

source_sentence: 今日至誠向十方佛尊法聖眾前，披肝露心求哀懺悔。
translation: From now on, I'll sincerely face the buddhas of the ten directions, the honored Dharma sages, and the noble ones in front of them, covering my liver and mind with repentance.

source_sentence: 「願弟子等，承是懺悔所生功德，願生生世世身相具足，猶如羅睺羅常值佛法僧，
translation: “May the disciples and others, having received this repentance, receive the merits produced by that repentance, wish to be born in a world where their bodies are endowed with all marks of physical excellence, just as Rāhula always meets

source_sentence: 恒聞妙法，壽命天地等，不為百病之所纏，六親眷屬常得相保護，怨賊刀兵永恒去離，
translation: They always hear the wondrous teaching that life, heaven, earth, and so on, are not afflicted by a hundred illnesses. Their six kinds of relatives and retinues will always be able to protect each other. Enemies, thieves

source_sentence: 自然衣服箱篋常盈，百味香飯盂中恒滿，牢獄閉所化作天堂，口舌相非變成和合，
translation: He naturally wore robes with boxes and bowls always full, always filled with a hundred flavors of fragrant rice containers, imprisoned in hell, transforming himself into a heaven where his mouth and tongue didn't become mixed.

source_sentence: 連年之病永去身心，疫毒諸災恒離意首，妖怪魍魎及以飛鳥虎豹豺狼，
translation: For many years he suffered from illness, and his body and mind were permanently freed from epidemics, poisonous diseases, and various calamities that always disturbed his thoughts.

source_sentence: 水陸諸禍一切等厄皆去無餘；
translation: All the calamities on land and water and all other calamities of distress are gone, without remainder.

source_sentence: 或自割刑或自瞋喜，如是等罪願從今已去，乃至成佛已來永相去離。
translation: Or they may cut themselves off and punish themselves, or they may become angry and joyous, and these sins and vows will be permanently removed from now on until they become buddhas.

source_sentence: 願弟子等，不為諸惡道之所受報，唯生大悲救護一切眾生，使皆盡性廣化諸類俱登正覺。」
translation: May the disciples and others not be subject to the results of bad destinies, but only give rise to great compassion to save all sentient beings so that they all attain right awakening by exhausting their nature and extensively transforming all

source_sentence: 大乘蓮華寶達問答報應沙門經
translation: *Mahayana-paripṛcchā(sūtra)

source_sentence: 寶達頃前入一剝皮飲血地獄。
translation: Earlier, Bao達 entered the blood-swallowing hell of skinning and drinking blood.

source_sentence: 云何名曰剝皮飲血地獄？
translation: What is the name of this hell called stripping skin and drinking blood?

source_sentence: 其地獄縱廣七十由旬，周匝鐵城鐵網羅覆，城四門上沸鐵下流，遍布獄中炎赫熾滿。
translation: The hell is seventy yojanas in length and breadth, surrounded by iron walls that are covered with iron nets. Boiling iron flows down from the four gates of the wall to the four sides, filling the hell cha

source_sentence: 復有機弩在於空中，罪人觸突機弩自發射罪人胸，或從眼入或從口入，
translation: Again, when the organic crossbow is in the air, the offender touches the protruding crossbow and shoots himself at the offender's chest, either from his eyes or through his mouth.

source_sentence: 箭所著處猛火俱起。
translation: Where the arrow is attached, a fierce fire arises at the same time.

source_sentence: 爾時，南門之中有五千罪人，號啼大哭唱如是言：「我今何罪來入此處？」
translation: At the time, 5,000 sinners in the south gate cried out and cried aloud, saying, What sin did I commit now to come into this place?

source_sentence: 宛轉投地而不肯前。
translation: He simply threw himself to the ground and refused to go forward.

source_sentence: 馬頭羅剎手持鐵鉤，望面而搭牽入獄中。
translation: Padmarāṣṭrapāla, holding an iron hook in his hand, faced them and carried them into the hell.

source_sentence: 罪人既入，飛火來燒其身，遍身焦爛皮肉相離。
translation: When the sinners entered, flying fire came and burned their bodies, and all over their bodies became scorched, leaving skin and flesh apart.

source_sentence: 乃有諸蟲千般種類，來飲其血諸頭牽掣皮肉分張，獄卒夜叉就中咼剝，
translation: Then there were a thousand kinds of worms that came to drink their blood, dragged their heads and hair, skin and flesh apart, and jailers and night-shark demons peeled away at them.

source_sentence: 骨肉異處痛切萬端。
translation: My bones and flesh were in distress at myriad points.

source_sentence: 一日一夜受罪無量，千死千生萬死萬生，經千萬劫無有出期。
translation: In one day and night they suffer immeasurable sins; a thousand deaths, a thousand births, ten thousand deaths, and ten thousand births take place for thousands of kalpas without an end.

source_sentence: 寶達問馬頭羅剎曰：「此諸罪人以何因緣受如是苦？」
translation: Boda asked Maudgala, What are the causes and conditions for these sinners to experience such suffering?

source_sentence: 馬頭羅剎答曰：「此諸罪人受佛淨戒而不堅持，心無慈悲手剝眾生殺害佛性，
translation: Padmarāṣṭrapāla replied, These sinners receive the Buddha's pure precepts but don't insist on them; their minds lack compassion and their hands strip away sentient beings of the buddha-nature of killing and harming.

source_sentence: 以此罪故墮是地獄。
translation: Because of this sin, they'll fall into this hell.

source_sentence: 後若得出當墮畜生中，百千億生為他所戮，怨讎相對無有了期，若生人中諸根不具。」
translation: If he later escapes, he'll fall into the animal kingdom, and a hundred thousand million sentient beings will be slaughtered by others; there's no time when enemies and opponents won't get along with each other, and

source_sentence: 寶達聞之，悲泣而去。
translation: Having heard this, Ratnākara wept in sorrow and departed.

source_sentence: 佛名經卷第二十八
translation: Foming jing, vol. 28
